00010     SoftmaxPolicy::SoftmaxPolicy(double constTemp) {
00011         assert(constTemp > 0.0);
00012         temp = constTemp;
00013         tempFunc = NULL;
00014     }
00015 
00016     SoftmaxPolicy::SoftmaxPolicy(Temperature* tempFunc) {
00017         this->tempFunc = tempFunc;
00018     }
00019 
00020     SoftmaxPolicy::~SoftmaxPolicy() {
00021         if (tempFunc != NULL)
00022             delete tempFunc;
00023     }
00024 
00025     void SoftmaxPolicy::getAction(Vector dist, Vector& action, Observation& obs) {
00026         int sampledAct;
00027         double oneNorm = 0.0;
00028 
00029         // Computes new temperature according to decaying function
00030         if (tempFunc != NULL)
00031             temp = max(tempFunc->getValue(obs.getSteps()), DBL_MIN);
00032  
00033         // Computes Gibbs distribution
00034         for (Vector::iterator i = dist.begin(); i != dist.end(); i++) {
00035             *i = min(exp(min(*i/temp, DBL_MAX)), DBL_MAX);
00036             oneNorm = min(oneNorm + *i, DBL_MAX);
00037         }
00038 
00039         // Pick an action
00040         sampledAct = Sampler::discrete(dist, oneNorm);
00041         assert(sampledAct < (int)dist.size());
00042         action[0] = sampledAct;
00043     }
00044 }
